title: MultiDeck
description: A deck that can contain other decks and a mixture of card types

title: TagDeck
description: A deck that subscribes to a mixture of tagged cards that match the deck tag

title: TagMap
description: A map that subscribes to a mixture of tagged Location cards that match the deck tag

title: Gallery
description: An image gallery that support embeds too

title: Map
description: A map that only recognises cards with geo data

title: Event Schedule
description: A calendar based deck that contains time sensitive events

title: Profile Directory
description: A directory of people and organisations that can contain other directories
